item.title: Home First Finance Gains 2.76%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Move
item.description: Home First Finance Company India Ltd recorded a modest weekly gain of 2.76%, closing at Rs.1,112.40 on 23 January 2026, outperforming the Sensex which declined 3.31% over the same period. The week was marked by a valuation recalibration and a strong Q3 profit announcement, which influenced the stock’s price trajectory amid volatile market conditions. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Nureca Ltd Falls 9.26%: 3 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Nureca Ltd’s shares declined by 9.26% over the week ending 23 January 2026, closing at ₹282.15 from ₹310.95 the previous Friday. This underperformance, while sharper than the Sensex’s 3.31% fall, followed a volatile week marked by an initial surge to upper circuit limits, a subsequent sharp reversal hitting the lower circuit, and a steady decline into the week’s close. The stock’s technical upgrade to ‘Hold’ and positive quarterly results contrasted with the week’s price weakness, reflecting a complex interplay of momentum, profit-taking, and market sentiment. Time: 50 minutes ago

item.title: Heranba Industries Ltd Falls 3.37% Amidst All-Time Low and Financial Struggles
